content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR ORGANISATION UNIT--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_organisational_unit
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

OrganisationUnitID      AS OrganisationKey,
OrganisationUnit        AS OrganisationUnitCode,
Description             AS OrganisationUnitDesc,
IsActive                AS IsActive,
IngestionDate           AS IngestionDate,
ValidTo                 AS ValidTo

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_organisation_unit_dim]

GO
